name: remote-code-editor-app
description: A web-based code editor with sandboxed execution

scripts.initialize: mkdir temp;cd temp;cp ../misc/package.json ./;npm install;cp ../misc/requirements.txt ./;python3 -m venv venv;source venv/bin/activate;pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Bismay Mohapatra <bismay4u@smartinfologiks.com>
